name: Custom anime-planet
description:
Custom anime planet which also features a cleaner design

Features: 
Cleaner, customizable, modern and better design
Easily customizable
Site banners are customizable
Forum 
Mobile support 

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884
I have a Discord channel for easier feedback and discussions about the styles:
https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui

user.name: Zhou Yahui
user.about:
Hi, I'm Zhou.

I make CSS themes I guess.
